name: SayGoodNight
0:
”Alexa open say good night.”
”Alexa launch say good night.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say good night
des:
Use this skill to end each day right! Alexa will say good night to you!

Not only will Alexa say "good night," but she will say it in a variety of interesting ways. From sweet whispered sentiments to abrupt bed time commands. This skill has a variety of "good night" sayings to suit every situation!

To use, simply say, "Alexa open Say Good Night!"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
